password.validation: Password must be 8-15 characters, include at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and a number

name.validation: It's too short. The name must have at least 4 characters

country.validation: It's too short. Country must be at least 3 characters long. Whitespace is not allowed

birthDate.validation: Invalid date. Age cannot be less than 14

alias.validation: Alias must contain at least 5 characters (a-z A-Z 0-9 _ -). Whitespaces not allowed
